data.description: Makes the MSDN dark and less of an eye sore

data.description: Dark background for menu in new design of store.playstation.com site.

data.description: Thème sombre pour YggTorrent (reprenant les couleurs de base)

data.name: Dpstreamhd - Séries et Films en Streaming
data.description: Dpstreamhd is a the most popular films & TV series streaming website. The website is providing the french language dub films & TV series. Get your favorite films & TV series on Dpstreamhd. Don't forget to visit Dpstreamhd. Thanks for read us.

data.name: Blur Tab on Unfocus
data.description:
Use this style to blur a tab when it loses mouse focus.

Good for stopping people from reading over your shoulder

data.name: NitroType Orange
data.description:
This theme makes many of the buttons and texts orange. I would welcome any thoughts on it. Enjoy.

My NT profile is https://www.nitrotype.com/racer/ethanmast

data.name: Brick-Hill Dark Mode | Rock-Solid | Makaveli
data.description:
Makaveli in this Killuminati, all through your body. The blow's like a twelve gauge shotty

Created specifically so that the site may look more appealing to the eyes, and that it will not put a lot of strain on it. Created by Leaf, some very useful fixes added by Nicolito (https://www.brick-hill.com/user/27929/). Rock--Solid Version is a version with everything fixed, meaning that there will be no errors (unless the css were to change for the site), but other than that everything is perfection.

data.name: NitroType Summer Theme
data.description:
For those of you that want a summer theme that enables you to race along palm trees along the ocean. 
Note: only the background is actually changed. The racetrack canvas is the same.

This is my NT profile https://www.nitrotype.com/racer/ethanmast

data.name: NO Youtube Premium Button
data.description:
Removes the "Get YouTube Premium" button from the OLD youtube design.
	
Removes the "This version of YouTube is going away soon. Switch to the new YouTube" message.

data.name: Relaxing Islands Theme - Green/Blue for Edgenuity
data.description:
More info coming shortly here.

A clean looking edit to Edgenuity. Easy to customize if you know a little CSS, or you ask me and I'll make you a custom Edgenuity theme for $1.

user.name: DerangedWifi
user.about:
I make themes for Edgenuity, an online school program.
Working multiple hours a day starring at the dull, lackluster Edgenuity work space got on my nerves, so I started making fresh, custom designs on the page.


Coming Soon - Edgenuity with smart embeds like Youtube + Google docs, to multitask all in one tab!.

data.name: Canvas LMS Fixes
data.description: Makes Canvas LMS use the full width of the screen and also fixes some small issues with the UI.
